All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddUser
The AddUser class provides a command-line interface for adding users to the MyVelib system.
AddUserTest
 
BalanceObservable
This abstract class is extended by LogFinishedTrips and notifies BalanceObserver.
BalanceObserver
This interface observes when a trip is written in LogFinishedTrips and then updates the user balance in consequences.
Bicycles
This class describes a bicycle.
BicyclesTest
 
Client
This class simulates the interaction between the user and the terminal for planning its trip.
Clui
The Clui class provides a command-line user interface for interacting with the MyVelib system.
Coordinates
This class describes cartesian coordinates of a point in the map.
CoordinatesTest
 
CreditCard
This class describes a credit card, knowing that every user has a credit card.
CreditCardTest
 
Display
The Display class provides functionality to display information about the MyVelib system.
DisplayStation
The DisplayStation class provides functionality to display information about a specific docking station in the MyVelib system.
DisplayUser
The DisplayUser class provides functionality to display information about a specific user in the MyVelib system.
DockingStations
This class describes a docking station.
DockingStationsTest
 
FreeToStationPrice
This class describes the pricing for a trip starting not in a docking station and ending in a station (standard or plus).
Help
Help
LeastOccupiedStationSort
This class describes the sorting algorithm that allows to retrieve the least occupied station.
LogFinishedTrips
This class describes the log of all finished trips.
LogObservable
This interface allows to observe parking slots in order to write finished trips in LogFinishedTrips.
LogObserver
This interface allows to enter finished trips in LogFinishedTrips observing the parking slots
LogOngoingTrips
This class describes the log of all ongoing trips.
MostUsedStationSort
This class describes the sorting algorithm that allows to retrieve the most occupied station.
MyVelib
This class describes the whole model of the situation.
Offline
The Offline class provides functionality to set a docking station in the MyVelib system as offline.
OfflineTest
 
OngoingTrip
This class describes an ongoing trip.
Online
The Online class provides functionality to set a docking station in the MyVelib system as online.
OnlineTest
 
ParkingSlots
This class describes a parking slot of a docking station.
ParkingSlotsTest
 
ParkingSlotsTest.TestLogObserver
 
Plus
The Plus class provides functionality to set a docking station in the MyVelib system as a "plus" station.
Pricing
This class describes the pricing operation for a trip.
PricingStategy
This interface allows to create different types of pricing strategies and to easily add new ones.
RentBike
The RentBike class provides functionality for renting a bike from a docking station or a specific location.
RentingTerminal
The class describes a terminal that the user will interact with.
RentingTerminalMethods
This terminal (representing the app) allows to - interact with the user to rent and return a bike - prevent a user from renting more than one bike at a time - create an ongoing trip added to the list ongoing_trips - register when a bike is parked in a docking station - register when a bike is let on the streets - add the trip to the log of finished trips (balances are updated automatically thanks to observer pattern)
ReturnBike
The ReturnBike class provides functionality for returning a rented bike to a docking station or a specific location.
SetUp
The SetUp class provides functionality for setting up the MyVelib system.
SetUpTest
 
SortStation
The SortStation class provides functionality for sorting docking stations in the MyVelib system.
Standard
The Standard class provides functionality for setting a docking station as a standard station in the MyVelib system.
StationBalance
This class describes the balance of a docking station.
StationBalanceTest
 
StationToStationPrice
This class describes the pricing for a trip starting in a docking station and ending in a station (standard or plus).
TestBalanceObserverPattern
 
TestPricing
 
TestSetUp
 
TestTerminalRenting
 
TestTripPlanning
 
ToFreePrice
This class describes the pricing for a trip starting in a docking station and ending not in a docking station.
Trip
This class describes a trip on a bike.
TripPlanningClient
This class is the client interface for using the terminal to make a trip planning.
TripPlanningClui
The TripPlanningClui class provides functionality for trip planning in the MyVelib system using command-line interface.
TripPlanningMethods
This class describes trip planning.
TripPlanningTerminal
This class acts as a terminal for a user.
UserBalance
This class describes the balance of a user.
Users
This class describes a user of our system.
UsersTest
